title: Ep. 54 - Should You Buy Stocks On This Pullback?
itunes:title: Should You Buy Stocks On This Pullback?
description: Stephanie Link, Director of Research at TheStreet.com tells us what companies she's buying after earnings. Also, Frank breaks down sentiment indicators, the markets, and reveals a few new under $10 ideas.
